snippet: The airline said its reservation system had failed, leading the carrier to halt flights across the country for several hours.
abstract: American Airlines resumes service after being forced to ground all of its flights for several hours after a nationwide problem with its computer systems; more than 400 flights were canceled and scores of others delayed; airline expects cancellations and delays to last for a few days as it tries to restore a normal schedule.
lead_paragraph: The airline said its reservation system had failed, leading the carrier to halt flights across the country for several hours.

headline.seo: American Airlines Resuming Flights After Computer Problem
headline.main: American Airlines Resumes Flights After a Computer Problem
headline.print_headline: American Airlines Resumes Flights After a Computer Problem
